properties.name: InsecureIngest
properties.description: Whether the channel allows insecure ingest.

type.description: Whether the channel allows insecure ingest.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: Channel type, which determines the allowable resolution and bitrate. If you exceed the allowable resolution or bitrate, the stream probably will disconnect immediately.

type.description: Channel type, which determines the allowable resolution and bitrate. If you exceed the allowable resolution or bitrate, the stream probably will disconnect immediately.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the asset model.

type.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the asset model.

properties.name: RecordingConfigurationArn
properties.description: Recording Configuration ARN. A value other than an empty string indicates that recording is enabled. Default: "" (recording is disabled).

type.description: Recording Configuration ARN. A value other than an empty string indicates that recording is enabled. Default: "" (recording is disabled).

properties.name: Preset
properties.description: Optional transcode preset for the channel. This is selectable only for ADVANCED_HD and ADVANCED_SD channel types. For those channel types, the default preset is HIGHER_BANDWIDTH_DELIVERY. For other channel types (BASIC and STANDARD), preset is the empty string ("").

type.description: Optional transcode preset for the channel. This is selectable only for ADVANCED_HD and ADVANCED_SD channel types. For those channel types, the default preset is HIGHER_BANDWIDTH_DELIVERY. For other channel types (BASIC and STANDARD), preset is the empty string ("").

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: Channel ARN is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.

type.description: Channel ARN is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.

properties.name: IngestEndpoint
properties.description: Channel ingest endpoint, part of the definition of an ingest server, used when you set up streaming software.

type.description: Channel ingest endpoint, part of the definition of an ingest server, used when you set up streaming software.
